results.title: Clinical impact of metformin exposure during Staphylococcus aureus bacteremia in patients with diabetes mellitus.
results.journal: Eur J Clin Microbiol Infect Dis
results.text_hl: Clinical impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure during @<m>DISEASE_Staphylococcal_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013203 @@@Staphylococcus aureus bacteremia@@@ in patients with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@.

citations.NLM: Lee JY, Kim ES, Chang E, Bae S, Jung J, Kim MJ, Chong YP, Kim SH, Choi SH, Lee SO, Kim YS. Clinical impact of metformin exposure during Staphylococcus aureus bacteremia in patients with diabetes mellitus. Eur J Clin Microbiol Infect Dis. 2023 Oct 18;():. PMID: 37851178

results.title: Trained immunity in recurrent Staphylococcus aureus infection promotes bacterial persistence
results.text_hl: Combination therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Rifampin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012293 @@@rifampicin@@@ promoted eradication of persisters and improved the severity of recurrent @<m>DISEASE_Staphylococcal_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013203 @@@S. aureus infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Lin XQ, Liu ZZ, Zhou CK, Zhang L, Gao Y, Luo XY, Zhang JG, Chen W, Yang YJ. Trained immunity in recurrent Staphylococcus aureus infection promotes bacterial persistence PLoS Pathog. 2024 Jan;20(1):e1011918. PMID: 38241414
citations.BibTeX: @article{38241414, title={Trained immunity in recurrent Staphylococcus aureus infection promotes bacterial persistence}, author={Lin XQ and Liu ZZ and Zhou CK and Zhang L and Gao Y and Luo XY and Zhang JG and Chen W and Yang YJ}, journal={PLoS Pathog}, volume={20}, number={1}, pages={e1011918}}

results.title: Photothermal Nano-Immunotherapy Against Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) Biofilm Infections.
results.text_hl: In this study, Ti3C2 MXene-@CHEMICAL_sulfated_polyvinyl_alcohol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C063253 @@@PVA@@@ nanosheets loaded with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (Met@TiC) are developed for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Staphylococcal_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013203 @@@MRSA biofilm infections@@@.

citations.NLM: Xu L, Lu B, Xie K, Fan W, Fang S, Zhu J, Yang J, Xu B. Photothermal Nano-Immunotherapy Against Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) Biofilm Infections. Adv Healthc Mater. 2024 Nov 19;():e2403318. PMID: 39562179
